name: Dreams of Flying
description:
You're a bird that can't fly, you're friends can but their bird brains, there's a flood coming but you have a raft, find your friends and get to the raft.

Tips

You have 3 wing flaps, use them wisely

Dropping off a ledge will cost you a wing flap

Stick to the platform you see can see

Frogs act as save points

Controls

Joypad 

or 

arrow keys and [space] or [z]

Music

https://opengameart.org/content/mushroom-dance

Some sounds 

https://opengameart.org/content/single-bee-sound

All in all i enjoyed this jam, lost my SFX guy before the start and my art person after a couple of days, oh well... i put something together at least and it was a scramble to finish.
